data.lyric:
[ti:You Time]
[ar:Scotty McCreery/Ilya Toshinsky/Jimmie Lee Sloas/Derek Wells/Frank Rogers/Aaron Eshuis]
[al:You Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Time - Scotty McCreery (斯考迪-迈克克里瑞)
[00:00.25]Composed by：Scotty McCreery/Frank Rogers/Aaron Eshuis
[00:00.50]You time you time you time
[00:10.22]You time you time you time
[00:14.49]The road's got me rollin' six days a week
[00:16.62]Whole lotta work and not much sleep
[00:19.72]But I love what I do
[00:23.28]Yeah I know it's what I signed up for
[00:25.86]Chasin' dreams from shore to shore
[00:28.65]And even seeing some come true
[00:32.68]But now and then
[00:34.41]I need to stop the spinnin' of the world yeah
[00:40.99]I need a little you time you time red wine
[00:44.72]Sippin' in a moonlight
[00:46.50]Your touch your skin your lips
[00:49.37]Kissin' on me all night
[00:51.21]I ain't tryin' to monopolize
[00:53.24]Your 24/7 365 but sometimes I need
[00:57.52]Just a little bit of me and you time you time you time
[01:04.48]Oh
[01:09.33]You're up before that sun can rise
[01:11.93]Climbin' mountains changin' lives
[01:14.83]Baby I love what you do
[01:18.51]You bring a smile to every face
[01:21.09]You make this world a better place
[01:24.33]You light up every room
[01:27.99]But girl now don't you know
[01:30.26]Sometimes I want you to myself with no one else
[01:36.74]Yeah you time you time red wine
[01:40.33]Sippin' in a moonlight
[01:41.95]Your touch your skin your lips
[01:44.80]Kissin' on me all night
[01:46.59]I ain't tryin' to monopolize
[01:48.61]Your 24/7 365 but sometimes I need
[01:52.79]Just a little bit of me and you time you time you time
[02:00.42]Yeah you time you time you time
[02:04.04]Yeah
[02:14.60]But now and then
[02:16.12]I need to stop the spinnin' of the world yeah
[02:22.46]I need a little you time you time red wine
[02:26.40]Sippin' in a moonlight
[02:28.13]Your touch your skin your lips
[02:30.88]Kissin' on me all night
[02:32.79]I ain't tryin' to monopolize
[02:34.77]Your 24/7 365 but sometimes I need
[02:39.03]Just a little bit of me and you time you time you time
[02:45.81]Yeah you time you time you time
[02:50.29]Yeah ayy
[02:52.73]Just me and you
[02:54.90]Just me and you girl
data.trans:
[ti:You Time]
[ar:Scotty McCreery/Ilya Toshinsky/Jimmie Lee Sloas/Derek Wells/Frank Rogers/Aaron Eshuis]
[al:You Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.50]渴望与你相处的时光
[00:10.22]渴望与你相处的时光
[00:14.49]每周六天 都在路上奔波
[00:16.62]忙于工作 难以充分休息
[00:19.72]但我热爱我的工作
[00:23.28]我知道自己的选择
[00:25.86]奔走世界追逐梦想
[00:28.65]我眼看着梦想实现
[00:32.68]但些许时候
[00:34.41]我需要放下工作 放慢脚步
[00:40.99]需要你的相伴 
[00:44.72]在月色映照下 啜饮红酒
[00:46.50]渴望你的爱抚 你的香吻
[00:49.37]彻夜缠绵交欢
[00:51.21]我可不是想缠着你
[00:53.24]只是每时每刻 我都需要你
[00:57.52]渴望与你相处的时光
[01:04.48]//
[01:09.33]太阳初升之前 你已醒来
[01:11.93]动身攀山越岭 改变生活
[01:14.83]宝贝 我喜欢你做的一切
[01:18.51]你是我的快乐源泉
[01:21.09]世界因你变得美好
[01:24.33]你整个人焕发光彩
[01:27.99]但姑娘你可曾知道
[01:30.26]我只渴望与你独处
[01:36.74]需要你的相伴 
[01:40.33]在月色映照下 啜饮红酒
[01:41.95]渴望你的爱抚 你的香吻
[01:44.80]彻夜缠绵交欢
[01:46.59]我可不是想缠着你
[01:48.61]只是每时每刻 我都需要你
[01:52.79]渴望与你相处的时光
[02:00.42]渴望与你相处的时光
[02:04.04]//
[02:14.60]但些许时候
[02:16.12]我需要放下工作 放慢脚步
[02:22.46]需要你的相伴
[02:26.40]在月色映照下 啜饮红酒
[02:28.13]渴望你的爱抚 你的香吻
[02:30.88]彻夜缠绵交欢
[02:32.79]我可不是想缠着你
[02:34.77]只是每时每刻 我都需要你
[02:39.03]渴望与你相处的时光
[02:45.81]渴望与你相处的时光
[02:50.29]//
[02:52.73]只有你我俩人
[02:54.90]只有你我俩人
